column3: Traffic;Kampot: ------A traffic accident occurred on June 4
column5: on National Road 3 in Thma Thmei village
column7: Teuk Chhou.------ A man driving a trailer was killed and a woman left seriously injured after an overloaded minivan hit them.------The van driver ran away
column8: leaving the vehicle with the number plate Phnom Penh 2C-7024 at the scene.------The woman was sent to hospital for emergency treatment. Both victims are currently unidentified.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/310850
